About.Name: Lacewing Blue Server

About.Comment: Multiplayer server, for use over LAN or internet. "Bluewing" recreation of Lacewing Relay Server. (b%i, %s)

Properties.Title: Version
Properties.Info: The version of the liblacewing library used to build this extension.

Properties.Title: Automatically clear binary
Properties.Info: After sending/blasting a binary message, clear the binary-to-send.

Properties.Title: Global
Properties.Info: Check this box to make Lacewing global across frames/sub-applications

Properties.Title: Global identifier
Properties.Info: Use the same global identifier in multiple objects to make them share the same global instance

Properties.Title: Enable multithreading
Properties.Info: Check this box to enable multithreading. This makes Lacewing ultra-responsive, and retains the connection when popup messages occur.

Properties.Title: Enable timeout warning
Properties.Info: If true, will cause messages to pop up after 10 seconds of a retained connection with no owning objects.

Properties.Title: Kill hosting when disowned
Properties.Info: CAN INTERFERE WITH GLOBAL SETTING. By default, kill the connection if all owning Bluewings are destroyed.

Properties.Title: Enable inactivity timer
Properties.Info: Will disconnect inactive clients after 10 minutes of inactivity; messages them on server -> peer subchannel 0 first.

About.Name: Servidor Lacewing Blue

Properties.Title: Versão
Properties.Info: A versão da biblioteca liblacewing utilizada para construír esta extensão.

Properties.Title: Limpar binário automaticamente
Properties.Info: Após envio/exposição de mensagem binária limpar o binário-a-enviar.

Properties.Title: Global
Properties.Info: Use esta caixa para tornar o Lacewing global entre frames/sub-aplicações

Properties.Title: Identificador Global
Properties.Info: Usar o mesmo identificar global entre vários objectos para que partilhem a mesma instância global

Properties.Title: Activar multithreading
Properties.Info: Esta definição activa o multithreading, permitindo assim que o Lacewing se torne ultra-responsivo e mantenha a ligação quando mensagens de popup aparecem.

Properties.Title: Activar aviso de queda
Properties.Info: Se o estado for true, as mensagens aparecerão 10 segundos após uma ligação ser retida com objectos sem dono.

Properties.Title: Desligar alojamento quando desempossado
Properties.Info: PODE INTERFERIR COM DEFINIÇÕES GLOBAIS. Por defeito, desliga o alojamento se todos os Bluewings empossados forem destruidos.

Properties.Title: Activar temporizador de inactividade
Properties.Info: Desconecta clientes após 10 minutoe inactividade; envia-lhes mensagem no servidor -> par subcanal 0 primeiro.

About.Name: Serveur Lacewing Blue
About.Author: Darkwire Software
About.Comment: Serveur multijoueur, pour utilisation par LAN ou internet. "Bluewing", une refonte de Lacewing Relay Server. (b%i, %s)

Properties.Title: Version
Properties.Info: La version de la librairie liblacewing utilisée pour cette extension.

Properties.Title: Effacer automatiquement les Binaires
Properties.Info: Après envoi/envoi-UDP d'un message Binaire, effacer le Binaire à envoyer.

Properties.Title: Global
Properties.Info: Cocher pour rendre Lacewing global entre les scènes et les sous-applications.

Properties.Title: Identifieur Global
Properties.Info: Utilise le même ID Global avec plusieurs objets pour faire en sorte qu'ils utilisent la même instance global.

Properties.Title: Activer le multithreading
Properties.Info: Cocher pour activer le multithreading. Cela rend Lacewing ultra-rapide et garde la connexion en cas de message popup.

Properties.Title: Activer l'alerte d'expiration
Properties.Info: Si activé, entraînera l'apparition de messages après 10 secondes d'une connexion conservée sans objet propriétaire.

Properties.Title: Arrêter d'héberger si renié
Properties.Info: PEUT INTERFERER AVEC DES PARAMÈTRES GLOBAUX. Par défaut, arrête la connection si tous les Bluewings propriétaires sont détruites.

Properties.Title: Activer le chrono d'inactivité
Properties.Info: Cela va déconnecter les clients inactifs après 10 minutes d'inactivité; Envoie un message serveur -> sous-canal paire 0 en premier.
